column4: guest97905, ubuntu uses sudo for root access, so unless you set a root password manually it doesn't have one
it leads to unauthorized enter to the system!
somebody entered unauthorized on my ubuntu system and i realized there was not root password configured is it usual?

i do not understand much of ports, i just changed all my passwords including router's and i destroyed all partitions on my system because a key logger was installed on it, i took of all my money from bank and moved to another.....
